sentences.sContent: This is a picture of a weasel I found in Northern Minnesota.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is a picture of a weasel I found in Northern Minnesota.
sentences.sCn: 这是我在明尼苏达州北部所发现的一只黄鼠的照片。

sentences.sContent: It was my first day on campus. The Winona State University of Minnesota, a small but neat and clean school.
sentences.sContent_eng: It was my first day on campus. The Winona State University of Minnesota, a small but neat and clean school.
sentences.sCn: 这是我在大学的第一天，明尼苏达州的威诺娜州立大学，一所虽小却干净整洁的校园。

sentences.sContent: In previous years, Stacy Hansen would either host a large Thanksgiving meal or fly from her Florida home to be with family in Minnesota. Not this year.
sentences.sContent_eng: In previous years, Stacy Hansen would either host a large Thanksgiving meal or fly from her Florida home to be with family in Minnesota. Not this year.
sentences.sCn: 在前几年，斯泰西·汉森将举办大型的感恩节餐，或从她的佛罗里达州的家中飞往明尼苏达州的亲友家。但今年没有。
